subject: Sports Injuries
Trampolines
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Joba Chamberlain said he would not second-guess his decision to take his 5-year-old son to a trampoline center, where he injured his right ankle last week.
snippet: The Yankees’ Joba Chamberlain said he would not second-guess his decision to take his 5-year-old son to a trampoline center, where he injured his right ankle last week.
